org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage
Class AeProcessSnapshot

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage.AeProcessSnapshot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeProcessSnapshot
public class AeProcessSnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeProcessSnapshot

Implements a process snapshot that contain all variables and correlation sets that are live for normal or compensation processing.

Field Summary
